BUTTON.WANT_RETURN: I want to make a return
BUTTON.DELETED_ACCOUNT: Sad to see you leave. Your account has been deleted. Hope to see you back soon.

LABEL.PASSWORD_REG: MIN.8 CHARACTERS, 1 CAPITICAL, 1 LOWER AND 1 SYMBOL
LABEL.FIRST_NAME_BUSINESS: FIRST NAME OF THE BUSINESS OWNER OR EXECUTIVE
LABEL.LAST_NAME_BUSINESS: LAST NAME OF THE BUSINESS OWNER OR EXECUTIVE

EMAIL_VERIFICATION.HOW_TO_REACH: Hello! Tell us how to reach you. We will send a verification code to your email.
EMAIL_VERIFICATION.TERMS_PRIVACY: I've read and accept the Terms & Conditions and Privacy Policy
EMAIL_VERIFICATION.SENT_VERIFICATION_CODE: We have sent an eamil with a verification code to {{mail}}.
EMAIL_VERIFICATION.SENT_VERIFICATION_CODE_AGAIN: We have sent another message with a new verification code to {{mail}}
EMAIL_VERIFICATION.NEED_HELP_DETAIL: If you need help, have questions, complaints, remarks, or just like to chat, please send an email to berkshares@humanitycash.com
EMAIL_VERIFICATION.CREATE_PASSWORD_DETAIL: Create a password to secure your account.

PROFILE.SELECT_PROFILE: Select the profile you'd like to create. If you're a business owner, you can automatically set up a personal profile.
PROFILE.LOG_OUT_CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to log out?
PROFILE.LOG_OUT_DETAIL: Please note that unsaved data will be lost.
PROFILE.PERSIONAL_DETAILS_BODY: We use your personal details to set up your BerkShares wallet. Don't worry, this information is not shared publicy!
PROFILE.WELCOME_BERKSHARES: Thank you! Welcome to the BerkShares App. Now it is time to add some BerkShares to your wallet!
PROFILE.BUSINESS_ACCOUNT_DETAIL: You do not have a business account linked. If you do have a business that accepts BerkShares you can sign up and link your business!
PROFILE.USE_BUSINESS_INFOMATION: We use your business information to set up your Wallet. The type of entity determines the required information.
PROFILE.USE_PERSONAL_DETAILS: We use your personal details to set up your BerkShares wallet. Don't worry, this information is not shared publicy!

BANK_ACCOUNT.ACCOUNT_ALERT: Link your bank account to start using the app.
BANK_ACCOUNT.USE_DWOLLA: BerkShares uses Dwolla to link our business bank account
BANK_ACCOUNT.DWOLLA_SECURE: Encrytion helps protect your personal financial data
BANK_ACCOUNT.DWOLLA_PRIVATE: Your credentials will never be made access to BerkShares
BANK_ACCOUNT.AGREE_DWOLLA: By selecting 'continue' you agree to the Dwolla Privacy Policy
BANK_ACCOUNT.LOGIN_BANK_DETAIL: By providing your bank credentials to Dwolla, you are enbaling Dwolla to retrieve your financial data.
BANK_ACCOUNT.SELECT_BANK_ACCOUNT_DETAIL: Which account would you like to link to BerkSahres?
BANK_ACCOUNT.CONGRATULATION_DETAIL: You have linked your Salisbury Checking (US-08-CHAS-0686-5892) bank account! Your are ready to load up your BerkShares and start supporting your community!

LOAD_UP.LOAD_UP_DETAIL: Specify the amount of BerkShares (B$1 = USD 1) you would like to load up.
LOAD_UP.LOAD_UP_SUCCESS_DETAIL: The BerkShares will be available in about 3 business days!

FORGOT_PASSWORD.FORGOT_PASSWORD_DETAIL: Enter the email address so we can verify your identity
FORGOT_PASSWORD.CREATE_NEW_PASSWORD_DETAIL: Create a new password to secure your account.

PAYMENT.PAYMENT_SUCCESS_DETAIL: Your receipt can be found in your transaction overview.
PAYMENT.CASH_OUT_DETAIL: Select the amount of BerkShares you would like to redeem to USD. Please note that the maximum amount is $ 2,000.00 and you can not exceed your account balance.
PAYMENT.CASH_OUT_CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to cash out?
PAYMENT.CASH_OUT_CONFIRM_DETAIL: You will redeem 100 BerkShares for USD 95.50 after a {{fee}}% fee.
PAYMENT.REDEMPTION_PROCESS_DETAIL: You'll get an email once your funds are available in your bank account. Don't worry, it won't take too long.
PAYMENT.SHOW_QR_CODE_TO_CASHIER: Show QR code to the cashier
PAYMENT.PAYMENT_RETURN_SUCCESS: SUcceeded! You have received B$ {{amount}} in return.

OTHER.HELP_CONTACT_DETAIL: We are here to help you with anything and everything on the BerkShares app.
OTHER.CONTACT_DETAIL: If you have questions, complaints, remarks, or just like to chat, please send an email to fennie@humanity.cash or contact the Schumacher Center by calling 010-125 08766

COMMUNITY_CHEST.CONTENT: The BerkShares community want to support the lcal community. Therefor, we ask you at each transaction if you are willing to make a donation. This donation will go to a local project. On this page you will find the current project and its status.
COMMUNITY_CHEST.REMOVE_BANK_ACCOUNT: Are you sure you want to remove this bank account?
COMMUNITY_CHEST.NO_BANK_ACCOUNT: You do not have a bank account linked. Link your bank account in order to enable buying new BerkShares and/or cash out to USD.
COMMUNITY_CHEST.HAVE_BERKSHARES: You still have BerkShares. Cash out before you delete your account.
COMMUNITY_CHEST.CONFIRM_DELETE_ACCOUNT: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
